lines.text: Get thee to Hell. Burn forever and a day. May thy foul carcass be food for jackals and thy blood drink for pariah dogs.

[after scaring Watson in vampire fashion]
Sorry to have alarmed you, Watson, but your reaction was instructive. So you believe in their existence?
What are WE to do with walking corpses that have to have stakes driven through their hearts to keep them in their graves? Are we to give serious attention to such things? It's pure lunacy.
The world is big enough for us. No ghosts need apply.
Please, you must excuse my frankness, but it is necessary that we confront the truth about ourselves if we are to reach the heart of this matter.
There are people we know who suck up the energies of others like a sponge, draw out their resources and pocket them, leaving them fatigued, no longer master of their wills.
I'm sorry if I've caused you pain.
